alert.note: Alert for Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 5:55PM CDT until June 08 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marion County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hackleburg, or 10 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Hackleburg, Bear Creek, Pigeye, Tessner and Upper Bear Creek Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
